Today in Donegal, Streedagh Strand is the spot to hit with a swell of 3ft @ 6s NW and a fresh 17 mph NNW wind. It's looking clean early, so get out there! Tomorrow, conditions improve with a solid 6ft @ 9s N swell and lighter 14 mph NNW winds at several spots like Pollan Bay and Rosapenna. Day after, the swell drops to 5ft @ 8s N with fresh winds, making it less favorable. Best: tomorrow.
